biotools.summary: COVID Term is constructed by Institute of Medical Information, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences and consists of the bilingual preferred terms, abbreviations, synonyms and some definitions and sources for concepts related with COVID-19 in disease, viruses, clinical manifestation, infected population, epidemic prevention and control, psychological assistance et. al.
